content: La moglie di Tom era palesemente assente dalla sua festa di compleanno, quindi sembra che le voci del loro allontanamento siano probabilmente vere.
translations: eng:Tom's wife was notably absent from his birthday party, so it seems rumors of their estrangement are likely true
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
